com.github.masooh.intellij.plugin.groovyfier Groovyfier OVERRIDEN-BY-GRADLE Converts a Java class to a Groovy class.
New action: Code -> Convert Java To Groovy.
Focused on converting JUnit tests to Spock specs.

Features:

  • Convert Java class to Spock spec
  • Replace @Before/@BeforeClass and @After/@AfterClass
  • Guess when/then/expect blocks
  • Replace simple asserts(assertEquals, assertTrue, assertNull) and the according negated ones

Limitations:
